name: @sentinel/agent
description: Agent orchestration: planner, executor, and state management

scripts.prebuild: pnpm --filter @sentinel/contracts build && pnpm --filter @sentinel/providers build && pnpm --filter @sentinel/tools build && pnpm --filter @sentinel/memory build && pnpm --filter @sentinel/observability build
scripts.pretest: pnpm --filter @sentinel/contracts build && pnpm --filter @sentinel/providers build && pnpm --filter @sentinel/tools build && pnpm --filter @sentinel/memory build && pnpm --filter @sentinel/observability build
scripts.pretypecheck: pnpm --filter @sentinel/contracts build && pnpm --filter @sentinel/providers build && pnpm --filter @sentinel/tools build && pnpm --filter @sentinel/memory build
